experiences.name: Swedbank
experiences.description: Risk and Compliance Platform department. Development and implementation in ServiceNow - GRC applications. "Business Continuity Management" application implementation. Custom application enhancement and maintenance. Developed a custom solution for standardized / styled PDF document generation. Continually improving development process by creating scripts and tools that bring value and helps improve the workflow for my team.

experiences.name: D8Corporation
experiences.description: Software development company. Banking related software maintenance and feature development. Work with NodeJS, ReactJS, Backbone, Jenkins, SQL

experiences.name: Datu tehnoloģiju grupa
experiences.description: Software and Hardware company. Development related to Worktime management software. User interface and server-side development. Primarily developed in JavaScript (React, Meteor, MongoDB). Hardware integration for facial recognition hardware in C#.

projects.name: Aribabox
projects.description: Woodworking design e-commerce store. It's a Shopify store with a customized theme. It is being used and gets clients every day.

projects.name: JDK Mārupe
projects.description: Latvian folk dance group's website. First website I've ever made, for my at the time dance group. It's still up and running!

projects.name: Vārdulis
projects.description: Latvian "Wordle" clone. Made in spare time as a fun project. It's a word guessing game where you have to guess a word in 5 tries. Had to figure out how to scrape a coherent list of words in latvian. It is being played by hundreds of people every day.

projects.name: Strawberry
projects.description: The first 3D project I've ever made. It's a 3D strawberry model with a simple animation. It's a simple project, but it was a big step for me in learning 3D web design.

projects.name: 3DConnect4
projects.description: It's a simple game, but was a good excercise to use Prisma with NextJS and implement real time player to player interactions.

projects.name: ATOM
projects.description: A fun project for visualizing the periodic table atoms. It's a simple project that uses ThreeJS with ReactJS and NextJS.

projects.name: Chocolate
projects.description: I like chocolate. So I decided to challenge myself and make a commercial astetique website for a chocolate brand. It's a simple project, but it was a good excercise in design and layout.
